row.column: Used for long, free-form text content items.
Used for long, free-form text content items that use Microsoft Word2000 as the editing tool.
Used for short content items intended to be used ONLY as part of another content item.
Used to create and maintain image content items, such as .gif, .jpg, and other graphic formats.
Used to create and maintain downloadable content items, such as .pdf or .exe files.
Allows users to explicitly select a group of other content items that go together to define the final published output.
Used to create URL content items that link to pages outside of your content management system.
Allows users to implicitly define an index through a set of parameters which are used by Rhythmyx to automatically generate the actual index for output.
This is the default content type used by content connector.
Page Variant for the Article Content Type
Snippet Variant for Article Content Type to create link from Title and Abstract to Article Page
Snippet Variant for Article Content Type to create link from Title to Article Page
Snippet Variant for Brief content type to generate snippet of Brief body
Snippet Variant to generate link from File Name to file
Snippet Variant to generate link from Binary File Name to binary file
Index Snippet Variant to generate link to Related Content Item
Index Page Variant to generate Home Page
Snippet Variant to generate link to external URL
Snippet Variant to generate link from thumbnail image to full-sized image
Snippet Variant to link to image from Image Content Item title
Snippet Variant to retrieve thumnbnail image file
Snippet Variant to retrieve full-sized image file
Automated Index snippet variant to generate sidebar navigation bar
Snippet Variant to link to Image from Thumbnail and Image Content item title
Snippet Variant to link to thumbnail image from Image Content item title
Manual index Snippet Variant to generate sidebar navigation bar
Page Variant for the Word Article Content Type
Snippet Variant for Word Article Content Type to create link from Title and Abstract to Article Page
Snippet Variant for Article Content Type to create inline link.
Snippet Variant for Word Article Content Type to create inline link.
Snippet Variant for Image Content Type to create inline link.
Snippet Variant for File Content Type to create inline link.
Snippet Variant for Index Content Type to create inline link.
Snippet Variant for Image Content Type to create full inline image.
Snippet Variant for Image Content Type to create thumbnail inline image.
Content variant that packages up a specified article variant for the BEA8 portal
Content variant that packages up a specified article variant for the RX portal
Content list for Automated Index Pages
Sidebar slot that holds and index or autoindex
State used to fix small issues in public items.
State used to fix small issues in public items.
State used to fix small issues in public items.
